title: Persons with whom Italians cheat on their partners 2017
summary: The Persons with Response in the Italians cheat was Response Stranger_met_in_a_particular_context_(disco_gym_holidays_etc.) , who made 25.4 respondents .
The most with Response was Does_not_reply , with just 1.3 respondents .

In second place was Response Colleague_from_work with 22.6 respondents ; third place went to Response Friend with 25.4 respondents ; fourth place went to Response Family_member with 1.3 respondents and fifth place went to Response Neighbor , who was 10.7 respondents .

data.Response: Stranger met in a particular context (disco gym holidays etc.)
Partner of a friend of mine

gold: A survey conducted in 2017 reveals that the largest groups of Italian respondents cheated on their partner either with a friend or with a colleague . In particular , 25.4 percent of interviewees in Italy stated that they betrayed their partner with a friend , while 22.6 percent did so with a colleague . However , it was common to cheat with strangers as well .
